name: Yehya Akoum
description:
Solution Expert at Lexzur Company. I work onsite at Dubai Police. I am a results-oriented graduate in Computer Communication Engineering with a strong academic background and hands-on experience in the telecommunications industry. I have demonstrated skills in cabling and jointing, Wi-Fi technologies, VoIP, and smart city solutions.

        I hold certifications in Cisco networking and have a proven track record of successful volunteer work as a paramedic. I am proficient in programming languages such as Python, Java, and C/C++, and I have a solid understanding of MATLAB and networking tools. As a collaborative team player, I possess excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.

        I am fluent in Arabic and proficient in English, with intermediate skills in French.
author: DevCRUD
